text: Answer: You do not have to wait at all! As long as you received an approved COVID-19 vaccine and are feeling well, come on in and see us! You ask, we answer. Learn more today: https://t.co/S3OFadJXIm #donateblood #covid19 #donatebloodsavelives #vaccine #thebloodconnection https://t.co/NMSielihBC
